page.title: 02Homes & gardens, Freshfield
page.content: The residential{Victoria Road}area of Freshfield is an affluent one. Nearly all of the houses have long curved chipping drives lined with bushes. We looked through the windows of a big house and saw five televisions in different rooms. Expensive cars spotted outside the houses include a Fiat X19, a Jaguar and a Mercedes. One garden has a summer house and a rockery with a waterfall. Another has a swimming pool with a diving board and a slide. Another has a summer house with a fish pond outside. Some of the residents employ gardeners and housekeepers. One large house has been converted into flats for old people.
